thread.title_full: WATCH: Mama June Drops Down To A Size 4 After Weighing 352 Pounds! | Qui West | 99.1 KGGI

title: WATCH: Mama June Drops Down To A Size 4 After Weighing 352 Pounds! | Qui West | 99.1 KGGI
text:
share 
"It appears that "Here Comes Honey Boo Boo" star Mama June has dropped down to a svelte size four after weighing a whopping 351 pounds, according to a new sneak peak from WE tv's show Mama June: From Not to Hot." SOURCE Qui West began his radio journey in 2006 as an intern in San Francisco where he developed a love for radio. From there, he became a public affairs host and landed a weekend on air spot with KYLD Wild 949. The he hit the majors and worked at Houston's legendary hip hop station KBXX 979 The Box. Qui West hosted the No.1 rated night show in the market for almost 4 years. Most recently, he was home in San Francisco at KRBQ 102. Now he has a new home, right here in the I.E. on 99.1 KGGI. Join him every afternoon from 2-6p and follow him everywhere @QuiWest. Contact
